snippet.title: Divers pull bodies from sunken ferry; toll tops 50
snippet.description: The confirmed death toll from South Korea's ferry disaster rose past 50 on Sunday as divers finally found a way inside the sunken vessel, quickly discovering more than a dozen bodies in what almost certainly is just the beginning of a massive and grim recovery effort.

snippet.title: In search for Relisha Rudd, volunteers undeterred
snippet.description: They canvass 4 D.C. locations in hope that missing 8-year-old girl will be found alive.

snippet.title: Medicaid paid $12M for Illinois dead
snippet.description: APNewsBreak: Internal memo says Illinois Medicaid paid $12 million for dead clients

snippet.title: Ohio couple married 70 years die 15 hours apart
snippet.description: A couple who held hands at breakfast every morning even after 70 years of marriage have died 15 hours apart.

snippet.title: Spirit of Professor Longhair alive at New Orleans Jazz and Heritage Festival
snippet.description: Two film projects in the works to tell the life story of Henry Roeland "Fess" Byrd, who died in 1980.

snippet.title: The true author of D.C.'s Emancipation Act is uncovered
snippet.description: He influenced generals and politicians alike, but his role in freeing the slaves in D.C. remained unheralded for more than a century.

snippet.title: APNewsBreak: Medicaid paid $12M for Illinois dead
snippet.description: The Illinois Medicaid program paid an estimated $12 million for medical services for people listed as deceased in other state records, according to an internal state government memo.

snippet.title: Gospel story of Jesus' resurrection a source of deep rifts in Christian religion
snippet.description: Religious leaders and believers strongly disagree over whether Jesus' rising is real or symbolic

snippet.title: Captain of sunken South Korean ferry arrested
snippet.description: The captain of a sunken South Korean ferry was arrested Saturday on suspicion of negligence and abandoning people in need, as investigators looked into whether his evacuation order came too late to save lives. Two crew members were also arrested, a prosecutor said.

snippet.title: Religion events from around the Washington area
snippet.description: Easter worship services, pipe organ concerts, bingo night, Henry VIII book discussion, choral concerts.
